a.info: We went to Universal Studios Florida over Thanksgiving break to celebrate birthdays

b.info: Ewen and Fiona participated in some fun school activities, including Girl Scouts, a talent show, and Mathapalooza

c.info: Baking cookies and hanging with cousin Cypress

e.info: Ewen and Fiona earned their bodan belts (one away from black) in Taekwondo, and Tabitha earned her red belt

f.info: David and Tabitha saw Tool and Elder in Charlotte, and David saw Mastodon in Raleigh

g.info: We did some fun activities in the area, including Carowinds, the White Water Center, and a trip to the mountains

h.info: Both kids played soccer with the Charlotte Independence in the Spring and Fall seasons (David got to coach Fiona's team in the Spring)
